products.product_brief_description: The future of health is on your wrist.
products.product_description: The Apple Watch Series 7 lets you measure your blood oxygen level, take an ECG anytime, and track your sleep. It has a larger, more advanced Retina display, an enhanced charging architecture, and faster charging. With breakthrough features and a brighter always-on display, it's the ultimate device for a healthier, more active, more connected life.

products.product_brief_description: Lots to love. Less to spend.
products.product_description: The Apple Watch SE combines the largest Apple Watch display, advanced sensors, and powerful features with exceptional value. It features a Retina display, heart rate notifications, fall detection, and built-in compass. With cellular models, you can stay connected even without your phone nearby. Get the most out of your day with the Apple Watch SE.

products.product_brief_description: The future of health is here.
products.product_description: The Apple Watch Series 6 lets you measure your blood oxygen level, take an ECG anytime, and track your sleep. It features a brighter always-on display, a faster S6 chip, and advanced fitness tracking capabilities. Stay connected, motivated, and healthy with the Apple Watch Series 6.

The Apple Watch Series 5 features an always-on Retina display, so you can see the time and important information without raising your wrist. It has advanced health monitoring capabilities, including a built-in ECG and fall detection. Stay connected, informed, and in control with the Apple Watch Series 5.
